ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
’Bout time you showed up,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! C’mon, with the right
attitude, we can get through anything!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2101_02_10: You can have it. No need to thank me!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you like this
sorta stuff?
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2102_02_10: If you like it, go ahead an’ keep it! It’s yours!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Here’s a little
somethin’ for ya!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
It’s to remind you that I’m always cheerin’ you on!
You can rely on me when you’re in trouble!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Yeah! I was just thinkin’ I wanted to talk with ya!
What’s on your mind?
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Huh? For me? Heh heh, thanks!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Ohh, you knew just what I wanted!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll take that to mean you’re cheerin’ me on!
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2402_01_10: Yeah, see ya later! It was fun!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Wow, we sure nattered on for a while, didn’t we.
That was fun!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
If you ever feel like it, come and tell me some
more of those interestin’ stories sometime!
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8001_0701_01_10: I like to come here ’cause it’s so comfy.
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
By the way, would you mind savin’ the seeds of
the Berries your Pokémon eat?
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Now that I think of it, my brother and I hardly
ever argue...
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I guess you could say it’s ’cause we get along,
but he might just be holdin’ back for my sake.
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Hmm, are sibling squabbles another thing I
oughta work on?
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I met someone else on Pasio who also has
trouble smilin’.
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
They were worried about it, ’cause they thought
they were smilin’ normally. Anyway, I can relate.
ch0245_00_mary_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Oh, and they’re proper good at Pokémon battles,
too, so I guess we’re rivals in more ways
than one!
